sentences.english: Shou was bestowed by Empress Dowager Cixi when she presented the Empress with the embroidered tapestry, Eight Immortals Celebrating Birthday.
sentences.chinese: 壽被賦予慈溪太后她皇后繡掛毯，八老慶祝生日。

sentences.english: Then, tonight we'll eat meat and potatoes. Tomorrow night we'll eat sukiyaki.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，我們今晚喫肉和馬鈴薯，明天晚上喫壽喜燒。

sentences.english: Sulzer Chemtech allows you to do business locally, no matter where you are.
sentences.chinese: 蘇爾壽化工允許你做生意的地方，無論您身在何處。

sentences.english: Have you ever eaten the sushi or tempura ?
sentences.chinese: 你以前喫過壽絲或者天麩羅嗎？

sentences.english: All of these reflect the academic situations of that time.
sentences.chinese: 陳壽的學術淵源正折射出當時的學術風貌。

sentences.english: They were the oldest people in the town.
sentences.chinese: 也是這個鎮上最高壽的人。

sentences.english: Each boy and girl raised ten yuan for charity.
sentences.chinese: 每個男生和女生爲慈善機構壽了十元錢。

sentences.english: Pray for longevity. Pray to the gods for auspiciousness.
sentences.chinese: 示求壽，向神明請求消災賜福。

sentences.english: "Ram the Spring and Autumn" as a family learning for generations to great-great-ram life.
sentences.chinese: 《公羊春秋》作爲家學，世代相傳至玄孫公羊壽。

sentences.english: The holding tastes "also say" rabbit "longevity chitose, 500 years its color white".
sentences.chinese: 《抱朴子》亦稱“兔”壽千歲，五百歲其色白”。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation

feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
